welcome.title: Slack End-User Tutorial
welcome.text:
If you have never used Slack before or would like to refresh your memory on how to use Slack, click the "Fundamentals for End-Users" link below.
When you have completed the tutorial, respond to this message with the :thumbsup: emoji.
<https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/115005333523|Fundamentals for End-Users>

title: What do I do now?
text:
•	<https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/219889247-Change-your-time-zone|Change My Time Zone Guide>
•	<https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/205239967-Browse-and-join-channels|Browse and Join Channels>
•	<https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/201864558-Set-your-Slack-status-and-availability|Set Your Availability>
